name: smol.game
description: An epic P2E version of life in it's most simple form Breed • Survive • Earn Auto-earning rapidly from birth, the smols purpose is simple: -Avoid starvation & predators (Bigs) -Expand your bloodline You want your smols to reproduce rapidly Each new #smol offers generationally proportionate rewards for a player's bloodline Our model runs on TensorFlow servers utilizing DeepQ Networks for recursive learning. Receiving rewards for correct decisions and penalties for negative outcomes - learning from this feedback to refine its future actions and improve performance
